messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
Could you let me know who the “last person you sent a message to” is? For example, their name or contact ID in your address book—so I know which entry to update.
I don't know any more info about them.

I’m unable to know which contact you mean without any identifier. Could you please provide at least one of the following for that person:  
- Their name as it appears in your address book  
- Their contact ID (if you have one)  
- Their current phone number on record  

With any of those, I can update their entry to +1 029 384 7563.
I really can't provide any more info. Just need that number updated.

I’m sorry, but I can’t update a contact without knowing which entry to change. Whenever you can, please share at least one of:  
• The contact’s name as it appears in your address book  
• Their unique contact ID  
• Their current phone number on record  

Let me know any of those, and I’ll update it to +1 029 384 7563 right away.
Got it. Let me know if there's anything else needed later.
Understood—just let me know whenever you have the contact’s name, ID, or current phone number on record, and I’ll update it to +1 029 384 7563.
